trans-unit.source: Provides the stack functionality for a stack of server channel sinks.
trans-unit.target: 提供堆疊功能給伺服器頻道接收的堆疊。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The sink to remove and return from the sink stack.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的接收，傳回自接收堆疊。

trans-unit.source: Pops the information associated with all the sinks from the sink stack up to and including the specified sink.
trans-unit.target: 從整個接收堆疊的所有接收以及指定的接收中，取出相關的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Information generated on the request side and associated with the specified sink.
trans-unit.target: 在要求端產生的資訊，與指定的接收相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫端沒有基礎結構使用權限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The sink to push onto the sink stack.
trans-unit.target: 要推入接收堆疊的接收。

trans-unit.source: Information generated on the request side that is needed on the response side.
trans-unit.target: 在要求端產生的資訊，為回應端所需要。

trans-unit.source: Pushes the specified sink and information associated with it onto the sink stack.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的接收和與其相關的資訊推入接收堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The information generated on the request side and specified in the `state` parameter is returned in the `state` parameter of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink.AsyncProcessResponse%2A> method on the corresponding sink.
trans-unit.target: 要求端上產生的資訊，並指定在`state`參數中傳回`state`參數<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink.AsyncProcessResponse%2A>對應接收上的方法。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫端沒有基礎結構使用權限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The status and state of an asynchronous operation on a remote object.
trans-unit.target: 遠端物件上之非同步 (Asynchronous) 作業的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Presents a callback delegate to handle a callback after a message has been dispatched asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 提供回呼 (Callback) 委派，以便在非同步分派訊息之後處理回呼。

trans-unit.source: The dispatched message represents a request method call on a remote object.
trans-unit.target: 分派的訊息表示遠端物件上的要求方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkStack.ServerCallback%2A> method is intended for use only by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkStack.ServerCallback%2A>方法僅供.NET Framework 遠端處理基礎結構時，僅供使用。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: A server channel sink.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器通道接收。

trans-unit.source: The state associated with <c>sink</c>.
trans-unit.target: 與 <c>sink</c> 建立關聯的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Stores a message sink and its associated state for later asynchronous processing.
trans-unit.target: 儲存訊息接收及其相關狀態，供後續非同步處理使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkStack.Store%2A> method is intended for use only by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkStack.Store%2A>方法僅供.NET Framework 遠端處理基礎結構時，僅供使用。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: A server channel sink.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器通道接收。

trans-unit.source: The state associated with <c>sink</c>.
trans-unit.target: 與 <c>sink</c> 建立關聯的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Stores a message sink and its associated state, and then dispatches a message asynchronously, using the sink just stored and any other stored sinks.
trans-unit.target: 儲存訊息接收其及相關狀態，然後使用剛儲存的接收和其他已儲存的任何接收，以非同步方式分派訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkStack.StoreAndDispatch%2A> method is intended for use only by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkStack.StoreAndDispatch%2A>方法僅供.NET Framework 遠端處理基礎結構時，僅供使用。

trans-unit.source: Also, the method should only be called by a transport sink to complete an asynchronous dispatch.
trans-unit.target: 此外，此方法只應該由來完成非同步分派的傳輸接收呼叫。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
